pages.title: Nile Monitor
pages.text: The population in West African forests and savannahs is sometimes recognized as a separate species, the West African Nile monitor ($(o)V. stellatus).$(br2)It is one of the largest lizards in the world reaching and even surpassing the perentie by size.

pages.title: Nile Monitor
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:food_turtle_raw$(br2)Number of Offspring: 5$(br2)Growth time: None Days
